title: D-Town's set
info: D-Town's set is a vanity developer item set that can be obtained rarely (5% chance) from Treasure Bags in Expert Mode. It is the vanity set made for D-Town, the Business Director at Re-Logic. Equipping the full set produces a pulsating effect similar to Adamantite armor, as well as a glow effect similar to Spooky armor.
